\section*{API CHANGE 2.0 }

\par
 List of the scheduled changes for the GFal 2.0 API \begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
this is not a final choice
\end{DoxyWarning}
\subsection*{I. OFFICIAL API : }


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item Gfal POSIX lib API:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item the Common functions API : \doxyref{all common functions}{p.}{group__common__group} \par

\item the POSIX style API : \doxyref{all POSIX style function}{p.}{group__posix__group} \par
 \par

\end{DoxyItemize}
\item Gfal REQUEST lib API :
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item the SRM style API : \doxyref{all SRM functions}{p.}{group__srm__group} \par

\item {\bfseries  internal API, use at your own risks } LFC\_\-API : \doxyref{internal LFC functions}{p.}{group__lfc__low__group}
\item {\bfseries  internal API, use at your own risks } SFN\_\-API : \doxyref{sfn low level functions}{p.}{group__sfn__low__group}
\item {\bfseries  internal API, use at your own risks } internal functions of gfal : \doxyref{internal functions}{p.}{group__internal__group} 
\end{DoxyItemize}
\end{DoxyItemize}
